Sept. 25, 1999 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Fourth Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-fourth-section
None
Memorial Hall, Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - solo cornet - Blaenavon Town. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 9 bands competed.
July 10, 2015, 6:51 p.m. July 3, 2020, 3:47 p.m.
1 Blaenavon Town Band Bryn Davies
2 Llanelli Band R. Owen
3 Abertillery & District Youth Eric Powell
4 Aberystwyth Youth Band Alan Phillips
5 Blaenavon Concert Band Andrew Hicks
6 Lady Windsor Band T. W. Morgan
